# SOCIALCLUB::SC_GAMERDATA_GET_ACTIVE_XP_BONUS

## Summary
Check to see if the user has an xp bonus (multiplier) added

## Parameters
* **FLOAT\*** xpBounsMult

## Returns
* **BOOL**:
True if there a xpBonus active.
xpBonusMult will have the value of the multiplier
